title: Starts of the Week + Week 8 Breakdown, Pitty City - Fantasy Football Podcast for 10/28
description:
It’s football time! Week 8 is here and The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason dive into Week 8 matchups and reveal their Starts of the Week! Plus, injury updates, and a new edition of “Never Not Working!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for October 28th, 2021.
  
 (06:00) - Never Not Working
 (15:30) - NFL News
 (27:55) - Fantasy Forecast
 (28:15) - Panthers at Falcons
 (33:25) - Dolphins at Bills
 (37:25) - 49ers at Bears
 (43:05) - Steelers at Browns
 (47:00) - Eagles at Lions
 (52:25) - Titans at Colts
 (55:40) - Bengals at Jets
 (59:20) - Rams at Texans
 (01:02:30) - Starts of the Week
 (01:02:40) - QB Starts of the Week
 (01:04:55) - WR Starts of the Week
 (01:07:05) - RB Starts of the Week
 (01:09:15) - TE Starts of the Week
 (01:12:25) - Boom Boom Kicker of the Week
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show
 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
  
 Check out today's sponsors:

 Disco -- Code: FOOTBALLERS
